alert.note: Alert for Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 12:29AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT WEST CENTRAL CAMDEN AND NORTHEASTERN CHARLTON COUNTIES THROUGH 115 AM EDT... At 1229 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles south of Hickox to near Homeland. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Folkston, Homeland, Race Pond, and Winokur. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton; Western Charlton
